content: Create a data table that lists five artificial intelligence companies and their founding years.

Here's a data table listing five artificial intelligence companies and their founding years:

| Company Name        | Founding Year |
|---------------------|---------------|
| OpenAI              | 2015          |
| DeepMind            | 2010          |
| NVIDIA              | 1993          |
| IBM Watson          | 2005          |
| SenseTime           | 2014          |

These companies are notable for their contributions to AI research and development.
